content.text:
# Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture

}}
The Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture is a prize at the annual Razzies to the worst film of the past year. Over the 45 ceremonies that have taken place, 232 films have been nominated for Worst Picture, with three ties resulting in 48 winners.
Winners and nominees
Following is a list of nominees and recipients of the Worst Picture prize, including each film's distribution company and producer(s).
